content:
I am Rıza! I am a lively Ph.D. candidate happy to be supervised by Francesca Grisoni 👩‍🔬 at the Molecular Machine Learning Group in Eindhoven University of Technology. I also hold high honor BSc. and MSc. degrees from the Dept. of Computer Engineering in Boğaziçi University, where I was lucky to work with Arzucan Özgür and Elif Özkırımlı👩‍🔬👩‍🔬.
Want to meet? Or just say something? Find me here!
summary: I am Rıza! I am a lively Ph.D. candidate happy to be supervised by Francesca Grisoni 👩‍🔬 at the Molecular Machine Learning Group in Eindhoven University of Technology. I also hold high honor BSc.
title: Rıza Özçelik

summary: A review of the deep learning approaches for structure-based drug discovery. Future research directions are outlined.
title: Structure-based Drug Discovery with Deep Learning

summary: We pharmacologically study chemical words and find that they can designate functional groups.
title: Interpreting Chemical Words of a Data-driven Segmentation Method as Protein Family Pharmacophores and Functional Groups

summary: We present a novel training framework to improve the generalizability of drug-target affinity prediction models.
title: DebiasedDTA: A Framework for Improving the Generalizability of Drug-Target Affinity Prediction Models

summary: We exploit the chemical language in SMILES and aminoacid sequences to predict drug-target affinity and present state-of-the-art level affinity prediction models.
title: ChemBoost: A chemical language based approach for the prediction of protein - ligand binding affinity

summary: We create a search engine to identify bichemically related molecules in CORD-19 abstracts.
title: Vapur: A Search Engine to Find Related Protein - Compound Pairs in COVID-19 Literature

summary: We present the first large labeled Turkish NLI dataset (NLI-TR) and models using machine translation.
title: Data and Representation for Turkish Natural Language Inference

summary: We present the first UI that enables online traversal of Turkish WordNet: KeNet.
title: User Interface for Turkish Word Network KeNet

summary: We develop a web application to use a Turkish NLP library (nlptoolkit) online.
title: User Interfaces for Turkish Natural Language Processing

summary: A dataset to measure sentence and paragraph level similarity in Turkish texts.
title: Data Set Generation for Analysis of Turkish Semantic and Sentence Similarity
